mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (M_ID, M_PASSWORD, M_NAME, M_GENDER, M_PHONE, M_EMAIL, M_HOST) VALUES (#{M_ID}, #{M_PASSWORD}, #{M_NAME}, #{M_GENDER}, #{M_PHONE}, #{M_EMAIL}, #{M_HOST})
mapper.select: SELECT M_ID, M_PASSWORD, M_NAME, M_GENDER, M_PHONE, M_EMAIL, M_HOST_REQUEST, M_AUTHORITY FROM MEMBER WHERE M_ID = #{id}
SELECT M_ID, M_PASSWORD M_NAME, M_GENDER, M_PHONE, M_EMAIL, M_HOST_REQUEST FROM MEMBER WHERE M_EMAIL = #{email}
